name: Hellhound Joe
description: Into the dark deafness ... In a bloodstained barn ... A monster, named Joe quenches his blood thirst on defenseless sheep, turning them into a bloody mess. But the sheep will fight back! They organize a mission to destroy the "bloody" barn and Joe. Now Joe can have plenty of fun, because he has a lot of daring lambs to deal with. So with the gun in hand, a meat grinder begins!
